ws_id.description: Web static ID. Mapped to the catalog it shows the intention of the current message

object_type.description: The name of the common object type

stage.description: Current stage of the message eg. Queue, ServiceManager, RandomWorker or CRM

message.description: Message detailing the current status of the message

error.description: True if this is an error message

complete.description: True if considered as a completed task
